content: VC 4LX-22 T15 Cordless L-Class dust extractor Powerful cordless dust extractor with large container for connection with power tools and jobsite clean ups (wet & dry), 15l (8 gallon) tank (Nuron battery) ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Construction vacuums and dust extractors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful yet compact - pair our most powerful cordless vacuum with your power tools to help reduce dust for increased safety, and clean up your jobsites more efficiently Built for flexibility – compact footprint with wheels and a push bar for versatile jobsite cleaning Optimized for cordless concrete grinding – with our DGH 130-22 Automatic filter cleaning – helps to keep suction high by removing dust from the filter for fewer interruptions during your work Optional auto-start available – suction can be turned on/off via Bluetooth® remote control Applications Wet and dry vacuum cleaning of construction dust, extraction of wood dust/ chips, and concrete debris from drilling/ breaking Large storage tank and automatic filter cleaning enables cordless concrete grinding Wet extraction, dry diamond drilling, sanding, and light grinding/cutting/slitting L-Class vacuum – for capturing 99% of dust with a grain size under two microns ### TECHNICAL DATA: Air Flow at Hose End: 63.57 l/s Container capacity: 15 l Dust capacity: 36 lb. Technical Data | Container capacity | 15 l | Application | Cleaning, Drilling and breaking, Wood sawing, Cutting and grinding (light, up to 125 mm / 5 in), Drywall and wood sanding, Wet coring, Socket cutting | Power source | Cordless ### ITEMS- 2415431 - Dust extractor VC 4X-22 & T15 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x VC 4LX-22 Dust extractor head - 1x VC 3/4-T15 Tank - 1x Hose 32mm x 3m (9.8 ft) anti-static - 1x Filter VC 4X/140 wet/dry - 1x Dust bag VC 3/4-T15 (10) plastic
